description: From Yiddish מזומן‎ (mezumen, “cash”), from Hebrew מְזוּמָּן‎ (m'zumán, “prepared, ready; cash”), passive present participle of זִימֵּן‎ (zimén, “to prepare, appoint”).

examples: I can post some strong-arm talent outside, but even non-Union like everything else in town, after a while that runs into considerable mazuma—so we should be thinking about longer-term solutions.
